description: Returns a list of all report plans for an Amazon Web Services account and Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: ReportPlanName
parameters.description: The unique name of a report plan.

nested_items.name: ReportPlan
nested_items.description: Returns details about the report plan that is specified by its name. These details include the report plan's Amazon Resource Name (ARN), description, settings, delivery channel, deployment status, creation time, and last attempted and successful run times.

nested_items.name: ReportPlanArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: ReportPlanName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the report plan. This name is between 1 and 256 characters starting with a letter, and consisting of letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), and underscores (_).

nested_items.name: ReportPlanDescription
nested_items.description: An optional description of the report plan with a maximum 1,024 characters.

nested_items.name: ReportSetting
nested_items.description: Identifies the report template for the report. Reports are built using a report template. The report templates are:

nested_items.name: ReportTemplate
nested_items.description: Identifies the report template for the report. Reports are built using a report template. The report templates are:

nested_items.name: FrameworkArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the frameworks a report covers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NumberOfFrameworks
nested_items.description: The number of frameworks a report covers.

nested_items.name: Accounts
nested_items.description: These are the accounts to be included in the report.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OrganizationUnits
nested_items.description: These are the Organizational Units to be included in the report.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: These are the Regions to be included in the report.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ReportDeliveryChannel
nested_items.description: Contains information about where and how to deliver your reports, specifically your Amazon S3 bucket name, S3 key prefix, and the formats of your reports.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the S3 bucket that receives your reports.

nested_items.name: S3KeyPrefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for where Backup Audit Manager delivers your reports to Amazon S3. The prefix is this part of the following path: s3://your-bucket-name/ prefix/Backup/us-west-2/year/month/day/report-name. If not specified, there is no prefix.

nested_items.name: Formats
nested_items.description: The format of your reports: CSV, JSON, or both. If not specified, the default format is CSV.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DeploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The deployment status of a report plan. The statuses are:

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a report plan is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: LastAttemptedExecutionTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a report job associated with this report plan last attempted to run, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of LastAttemptedExecutionTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulExecutionTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a report job associated with this report plan last successfully ran, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of LastSuccessfulExecutionTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.
